travel_to_the_nether.title: Travel to The Nether
travel_to_the_nether.description: A 2 by 3 ring of Obsidian lit with Flint and Steel. That`s all you need to lit and jump.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome to hell! Hard to roam around and constant fear of fire.

locate_nether_fortress.title: Find a Nether Fortress
locate_nether_fortress.description: The Nether Fortress hosts many dark creatures that exit to The Overworld. Give the realm some help!

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Now let`s do some cleaning around.

50enemies_nether.title: Slay 50 Enemies in The Nether
50enemies_nether.description: This new place is much more harsh. New possibilities, new enemies. Get acquainted.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Theats still persists, but we have a now an improved calm.

locate_bastion_remnant.title: Find a Bastion
locate_bastion_remnant.description: Bastions are the home of the Piglins. Bling yourself with some gold if you want to trade with them.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing. See if you can find any good trades.

locate_nether_city.title: Find a Nether City
locate_nether_city.description: Nether City are hostile places but filled with Cincinnasite, the main alloy of The Nether

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good. Take care out there. It`s not as friendly as it is shiny!

get_forged_backpack.title: Get a Forged Backpack
get_forged_backpack.description: Craft a Forged Backpack to carry even more items with you roadming the world.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Did you knew you can upgrade your backpack to compact items for you?

locate_gauntlet_arena.title: Find a Gantlet Arena
locate_gauntlet_arena.description: The Gauntlet Arena is the home of Nether Gauntlet. Massive square black cube easy to spot from far away.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Creepy and warm place. Let`s hope you grabbed a pickaxe.

slay_nether_gauntlet.title: Slay The Nether Gauntlet
slay_nether_gauntlet.description: The Nether Gauntlet is an evil hand with many ways of harming others. Take care!

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! You have now freed the area of the menace.

get_blazing_eye.title: Get a Blazing Eye
get_blazing_eye.description: Blazing Eyes are found in the Gauntlet Arena, but i have no idea where to find them.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! You can use this eye to fly around harnessing it`s magic power

place_table_of_elevation.title: Get a Table Of Elevation
place_table_of_elevation.description: Craft a Table Of Elevation and place it down.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good Job! Now you can fly around home magically!

55combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 55
55combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 55.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

get_tier_5_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 5
get_tier_5_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

slay_the_wither.title: Slay The Wither
slay_the_wither.description: The Wither is striclty summoned by placing 3 wither skulls over 3 soul sand blocks that are hold by another soul sand block. Be prepared.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Impressive work! It`s eye is a must for traveling to The End Dimension.

place_augmenting_table.title: Get an Augmenting Table
place_augmenting_table.description: Craft an Augmenting Table and place it down. Very useful to improve your affixes.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing! Make use of it if you want stronger gear!

60combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 60
60combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 60.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_nether_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_nether_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues. It`s time to go upwards, towards The Undergarden
